page.title: 16STUCTURE PLAN - WILLOUGHBY
page.content: The Leicestershire stucture plan sets out the county council's planning policies and it's main proposals for industrial and residential change and development. Under this plan, in Willoughby Waterleys new housing development is not considered desirable, other than on a very limited scale. Houses will only be built for those who need to live in the village. For example some people may need to live in or near Willoughby Waterleys while others may have close family association within the village. Willoughby also features in a conservation area which means changes are carefully controlled.In addition old buildings are protected and money may be given to assist this. The plan helps to maintain the characteristics of villages like Willoughby.
